frontmatter.title: FieldBlock
frontmatter.description: `FieldBlock` is a reusable wrapper for building Field-components. It shows surrounding elements through properties from `FieldProps` like `label` and `error`.

frontmatter.title: ValueBlock
frontmatter.description: `ValueBlock` is a reusable wrapper component that can be used to easily create custom Value-components that will display in the same way as other Value-components.

frontmatter.title: useDataValue
frontmatter.description: The `useDataValue` hook standardize handling of the value flow for a single consumer component representing one data point.
